verses.name: Luke 1:39
verses.text: And Mary arose in those days, and went into the hill country with haste, into a city of Juda;

verses.name: Luke 1:40
verses.text: And entered into the house of Zacharias, and saluted Elisabeth.

verses.name: Luke 1:41
verses.text: And it came to pass, that, when Elisabeth heard the salutation of Mary, the babe leaped in her womb; and Elisabeth was filled with the Holy Ghost:

verses.name: Luke 1:42
verses.text: And she spake out with a loud voice, and said, Blessed art thou among women, and blessed is the fruit of thy womb.

verses.name: Luke 1:43
verses.text: And whence is this to me, that the mother of my Lord should come to me?
